eventDecorators.name: PayeeAdded
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: PaymentReceived
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: PaymentReleased
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initialized an instance of `PaymentSplitterCloneable` where each account in `payees` is assigned the number of shares at the matching position in the `shares` array. All addresses in `payees` must be non-zero. Both arrays must have the same non-zero length, and there must be no duplicates in `payees`. This function may be called only once and should be called in the same transaction that created the splitter.

functionDecorators.name: numPayees
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the number of payees in `_payees`.

functionDecorators.name: payee
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the address of the payee number `index`.

functionDecorators.name: release
functionDecorators.description: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of Ether they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals.

functionDecorators.name: released
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of Ether already released to a payee.

functionDecorators.name: shares
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

functionDecorators.name: totalReleased
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the total amount of Ether already released.

functionDecorators.name: totalShares
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the total shares held by payees.
